name: Kalma
description:
Visual Novel Kalma/Kuolio demo (Name pending), is part of thesis I worked on for few months. In thesis I explain about my work process and in short about visual novels in general, as well as about tools I used and about my inspirations.

I AM AWARE OF SOME OF THE OBVIOUS BUGS. Sadly my deadline gave me no choice but finish the project unfinished.
I am not sure if I am going to continue the project or not.

WARNINGS: Slight gore

Characters and art belong to me. You may not use them for any purposes.

Credits:

Art, writing: Laura Kyllönen
Program: Unity, Fungus
